pages.title: ∀ CreateLogicLink
pages.text: The $(bold)∀$() ("for all") symbol is the mod's emblem — representing universal control over all your factory machines through code.

pages.title: What is CreateLogicLink?
pages.text: $(thing)CreateLogicLink$() connects $(thing)Create$() mod machinery to $(thing)CC:Tweaked$() computers.$(br2)Place LogicLink blocks next to a computer to access Create's logistics networks, kinetic systems, redstone links, and train networks — all through Lua code.

pages.title: The Blocks
pages.text: $(li)$(item)Logic Link$() — Hub for inventory, item requests, wireless device control$(br)$(li)$(item)Logic Sensor$() — Reads data from any Create machine$(br)$(li)$(item)Redstone Controller$() — Wireless redstone via Lua$(br)$(li)$(item)Creative Logic Motor$() — Rotation source$(br)$(li)$(item)Logic Drive$() — Rotation modifier$(br)$(li)$(item)Train Controller$() — Global train monitoring$(br)$(li)$(item)Train Monitor$() — Visual train map

pages.title: Quick Start
pages.text: $(bold)1.$() Place a $(item)Logic Link$() on a Create logistics network$(br)$(bold)2.$() Place a $(thing)CC:Tweaked Computer$() next to it$(br)$(bold)3.$() Open the computer terminal$(br)$(bold)4.$() Type this Lua code:$(br2)$(#4488CC)local link = peripheral.find("logiclink")$(br)print(link.isLinked())$(br)local items = link.list()$(br)for _, item in ipairs(items) do$(br)  print(item.name)$(br)end$()

pages.title: Peripheral Names
pages.text: Each block registers as a CC peripheral with a specific type name:$(br2)$(li)$(thing)"logiclink"$() — Logic Link$(br)$(li)$(thing)"logicsensor"$() — Logic Sensor$(br)$(li)$(thing)"redstone_controller"$() — Redstone Controller$(br)$(li)$(thing)"creative_logic_motor"$() — Creative Logic Motor$(br)$(li)$(thing)"logic_drive"$() — Logic Drive$(br)$(li)$(thing)"train_controller"$() — Train Controller$(br)$(li)$(thing)"storage_controller"$() — Storage Controller$(br)$(li)$(thing)"storage_interface"$() — Storage Interface
